== Introduction ==
vatlator is a simple Ubuntu-based operating system, with the sole purpose of providing an installable live cd with tor active by default to browse the web anonimously. run the live cd, connect to the internet, start firefox and without setting anything bypass the censorship!
== Contact Information ==
Os website http://www.vatlator.in  
 Developer Page http://www.emanueleincremona.tk
== Audience ==
Target of this distro are peoples who lives in country with censorship
